meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Warning on Western Fires Interior Secretary Bruce Babbitt said the wildfires raging across the West were likely to get worse and warned that with resources already stretched to the limit, little could be done to slow them. PAGE A8
Cuba Blocking Olympians Cuban athletes who defect have discovered that the country's Olympic committee is determined to keep them from competing in the Games. SPORTSSATURDAY, PAGE D1
After the Mosquito Bites Some survivors of the West Nile virus, infected and sickened last summer, have recovered easily. Others have not. PAGE B1

Cancer Surgery for McCain Senator John McCain of Arizona said that he would have surgery this morning to remove two malignant melanomas that were discovered after a routine skin examination earlier this month. PAGE A12

Warning on Western Fires Interior Secretary Bruce Babbitt said the wildfires raging across the West were likely to get worse and warned that with resources already stretched to the limit, little could be done to slow them. PAGE A8
Cuba Blocking Olympians Cuban athletes who defect have discovered that the country's Olympic committee is determined to keep them from competing in the Games. SPORTSSATURDAY, PAGE D1
After the Mosquito Bites Some survivors of the West Nile virus, infected and sickened last summer, have recovered easily. Others have not. PAGE B1

Cancer Surgery for McCain Senator John McCain of Arizona said that he would have surgery this morning to remove two malignant melanomas that were discovered after a routine skin examination earlier this month. PAGE A12
